pages.title: Damage
pages.text: $(bold)COST: Lv1 = $(spell) + $(#FF4823)Magma Block$() $(br)$(bold)Lv2 = $(spell) + Wither Rose $(br2)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)2$()$(br2)$(bold)XP COST:$() 【 Lv1 = $(#green)4$() 】•【 Lv2 = $(#green)8$() 】 $(br2)$(italic)''The most basic combat spell at your disposal, fairly easy to craft but powerful''$()

When you cast $(#ff2054)$(bold)Damage$(), a spiky projectile will be cast and any entity struck with it will be inflicted with $(bold)Instant Harm$().$(br2)The higher level that the spell is, the more damage the spell will cause to the entity it hits (Does not work on Undead mobs).$(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
